full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Contract Title
Compressors and Compressor Components

## Tender Details

* Tender Reference Number: PW-22-01004672
* Solicitation Number: W8482-229951/A
* Publication Date: August 18, 2022
* Tender Closing Date: September 20, 2022 (14:00:00)
* Amendment Number: 1 (September 9, 2022)

## Solicitation Information

* Solicitation Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Procurement Method: Competitive – Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Not Applicable
* Trade Agreements: Various (see below)

## Goods and Services
The Department of National Defence seeks proposals for the procurement of compressors and compressor components. Deliveries are requested for the following items:

* Rotor Stator Unit (3 units, CFB Halifax and CFB Esquimalt)
* Cylinder Sleeve (12 units and 10 units, CFB Halifax and CFB Esquimalt)
* Piston, Piston Guide, Reciprocating Compressor (5 units and 7 units, CFB Halifax and CFB Esquimalt)
* Lubricating Oil, Air Compressor (75 units, CFB Halifax and CFB Esquimalt)
* Reciprocating Compressor (3 units and 2 units, CFB Halifax and CFB Esquimalt)

## Trade Agreements
This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Delivery Addresses
Deliveries are to be made to the following locations:

* CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia
* CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia

## Contact Information
For more information, please contact:

Neil Trousdale
neil.trousdale@forces.gc.ca
